item.title: Social Networks & Social Gaming used most for Mobile Broadband
item.description: This news from Hutchison 3G UK shows that using social media is more important on their mobile network is interesting â€¦. Keeping up to date with friends or regular gameplay on the move is now more important than checking emails or reading the news. In my opinion, Social Networking continues to dominate growth in internet usage - however, you shouldn’t assume that its all fun on the go. Social Media sites like Twitter, Facebook and LinkedInare all used for b2b leads and d2c customer service.
